name: Office Administration Services
description: Providers of general administrative support, including reception, mailroom, and facilities management services to businesses and organizations.

name: Virtual Assistant Services
description: Companies offering remote administrative support, such as email management, scheduling, and data entry, to clients across various industries.

name: Document Management Services
description: Firms providing document scanning, storage, and retrieval services, as well as document destruction and shredding, to help organizations manage their paperwork.

name: Human Resources Outsourcing
description: Providers of HR-related services, including recruitment, payroll processing, benefits administration, and compliance, to businesses of all sizes.

name: Call Center and Telemarketing Services
description: Companies operating call centers and providing telemarketing services, including customer service, sales, and lead generation, to clients across various industries.

name: Mailroom and Courier Services
description: Firms providing mailroom management, courier services, and logistics support to businesses, helping them manage their mail and package delivery needs.

name: Facilities Management Services
description: Providers of facilities management services, including maintenance, repair, and operations support, to help organizations manage their physical spaces.

name: Travel and Expense Management Services
description: Companies offering travel booking, expense reporting, and reimbursement services to businesses, helping them manage their corporate travel needs.

name: Meeting and Event Planning Services
description: Firms providing meeting and event planning services, including venue selection, catering, and logistics support, to businesses and organizations.

name: Records Management Services
description: Providers of records management services, including document storage, retrieval, and destruction, to help organizations manage their physical and digital records.
